results.title: Tear cytokines as potential biomarkers in non-infectious uveitis: post hoc analysis of a randomised clinical trial.
results.text_hl: PURPOSE: The study aimed to evaluate cytokines in tears as potential biomarkers in non-infectious @<m>DISEASE_Uveitis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D014605 @@@uveitis@@@. METHODS: Tear samples were obtained using Schirmer strips from 50 @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ enrolled in a randomised controlled study of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ in non-infectious @<m>DISEASE_Uveitis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D014605 @@@uveitis@@@ and from a control group of 30 healthy participants.
